kdr.resume.salestaxes.store
Class Store

java.lang.Object
  kdr.resume.salestaxes.store.Store

public class Store
extends java.lang.Object

Store is used to make purchases and generate a receipt. It could be extended with more store like functionality later.

Author:
Kris Read
